thread.title: NPP has workable plan to rescue Ghana - Kwabena Agyepong
thread.title_full: NPP has workable plan to rescue Ghana - Kwabena Agyepong

title: NPP has workable plan to rescue Ghana - Kwabena Agyepong
text:
Source: NPP Communications Date: 13-10-2015 Time: 04:10:38:pm 
The General Secretary of the largest opposition party, Mr. Kwabena Agyei Agyepong, has stated that the NPP has a workable and achievable plan that will rescue Ghana from its current economic and social woes. 
Mr. Agyepong made this remarks during the inauguration of NPP Switzerland Branch at Zurich over the weekend. 
Highlighting Nana Akufo Addo's four point plan for the economic transformation of the country, Mr. Agyepong stated the need for the NPP to rescue the country from the clutches of the incompetent Mahama administration who are bent on mortgaging our children's future. 
"Ours is a redemption mission to deliver to the people of Ghana a government that cares for the people, rewards handwork, works for the suffering masses, is friendly to business, whilst providing free education as a springboard to opportunity for all", he stressed. 
He urged his party's rank and file to work harder to gain the majority seats in Parliament and also deliver a decisive onetouch victory for its flagbearer, Nana Akufo Addo in the 2016 Presidential elections. 
The newly created NPP Switzerland branch thanked their General Secretary for his stewardship so far and assured the party of their service, commitment and dedication towards victory in the 2016 general elections SHARE THIS STORY
